messages.subject: This is the end for me
messages.msgSnippet: I just want to let you guys know that I am leaving this list.  I am so tired of the arguing and everything, that I have been deleting every post from this list
messages.messageBody:
I just want to let you guys know that I am leaving this list. I am so
tired of the arguing and everything, that I have been deleting every
post from this list for days. If I'm going to delete them all, why
bother being on the list in the first place? Anyone who wants to
correspond to me privately may. I hope some of you guys will get
a life instead of living just to batter each other with words each day.

Judie

Judie

"Keep me away from the wisdom that does not cry,
the philosophy which does not laugh, and the greatness
which does not bow before children." -Kahlil Gibran

messages.subject: Free Everything Homeschool USA CD
messages.msgSnippet: I know I told some of you on one of my lists one day last week about this, but could not remember which list, so am sending this to all of my lists and I
messages.messageBody:
I know I told some of you on one of my lists
one day last week about this, but could not
remember which list, so am sending this to
all of my lists and I apologize to the one I
already shared it with ...

http://www.cpronline.net/software.html

EVERYTHING HOMESCHOOL USA

This is a free CD coming out in August
that has the following:

1000's of website links for homeschooling
information, producibles, educational games,
information on all subjects, as well as worksheets,
etc.

Listings for all states - businesses that offer products
or services related to homeschooling.

*** Within the Program itself are :

Teaching tools for homeschooling parents

Organization and record keeping tools

Lots of printable templates

Laws for each state regarding homeschooling

A list of what your child should know at every grade level 1-12

etc. etc. etc...

You name it - this CD has it.

AND ............ It is free to homeschool families !!!!!!!!!!

If you have not gotten on the waiting list for the new release
in August 2001 - Sign up today!!! There has been a high
demand for them, so soon we will have to begin a signup
for a second shipping, but you can still get in on the first
shipment right now.

AND: UPDATES will always be free !!!

There is an update now button within the program
you will thereby be able to get the latest updates
to the listings in this program as soon as they come
available and they will always be free !!!!

http://www.cpronline.net/software.html

Get yours today!!!

Many have written saying it sounds too good to be true !
Well, we are glad it sounds that way, but it really is true :)

They say need is the basis for invention .... This CD came about
after us becoming a homeschool family and seeing how hard
it is to track down all the things and information you need to do
it ... Now it is all available in one easy to use software program
.... I am not just asking you to use it - I WILL USE IT! ...

The database of listings within this program is HUGE!
There is information about everything you can think of
to do with homeschooling !!!

You Will Love It!!!

~ Rita








~ Childhood is that state which ends
the moment a puddle is first viewed
as an obstacle instead of an opportunity. ~
- Kathy Williams -
